summary.heading: PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
summary.text: Results-driven product manager with 7+ years of experience leading cross-functional teams to deliver innovative software products. Expertise in agile methodologies, user research, and data-driven decision making. Proven ability to translate business objectives into actionable product strategies.

content.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Led product strategy for B2B SaaS platform generating $5M+ annual revenue
Increased user engagement by 45% through data-driven feature prioritization and A/B testing
Managed roadmap and coordinated releases across engineering, design, and marketing teams
Conducted user interviews and usability studies with 100+ customers to inform product decisions

content.title: Product Manager
bullets: Launched mobile app that acquired 50K users in first 6 months
Collaborated with engineering team to reduce app load time by 70%
Defined and tracked KPIs including DAU, retention rate, and conversion metrics
Presented quarterly product updates to executive leadership and stakeholders

content.title: Associate Product Manager
bullets: Assisted in managing product backlog and sprint planning for agile development team
Created user stories and acceptance criteria for new features
Performed competitive analysis and market research to identify product opportunities
